data.comment: The big names in today's match at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium have now been confirmed.
The first-half is under way at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium - Birmingham kick-off to start the match.
Goal! Scott Hogan gives Birmingham a 1-0 lead.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Reading kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Goal! Reading go level at 1-1 through Matt Miazga in Birmingham.
Jude Bellingham (Birmingham) has received a yellow card from Andy Davies.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Yakou Meite.
John Swift for Reading has been booked by Andy Davies and receives a first yellow card.
Maxime Colin (Birmingham) has received a first yellow card.
The home team have replaced Jude Bellingham with Kerim Mrabti. This is the first substitution made today by Pep Clotet.
The away team replace Ovie Ejaria with Pele.
Garath McCleary is replacing Michael Olise for the away team.
Reading make their third substitution with Liam Moore replacing John Swift.
Maikel Kieftenbeld is replacing Ivan Sunjic for Birmingham at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
Goal! Reading extend their lead to 1-3 through Pele.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
